QuestData.Title: Secrets of Riplash
QuestData.Description: There is someone who might shed light on this mystery, $r. It is rumored that the kvaldir have kept a handful of naga priestesses alive inside the temple.$B$BThe high priestess, Veehja, will no doubt have great reason to resent her uninvited kvaldir guests. Perhaps she can tell you more about what the writing on the tablet means.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Veehja at the ruins of Riplash in Borean Tundra.
